testcase.name: Create User and Validate Response Body
testcase.system-out: Given Create User with the help of POJO.....................................passed Then Check Response Body....................................................passed And Validate response code as 201...........................................passed And Validate response line as "HTTP/1.1 201 Created"........................passed And Validate response time less than 3000..................................passed And Validate header type as "application/json; charset=utf-8"...............passed And Validate server type as "cloudflare"....................................passed
